Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.CLI.utils

package it.polimi.ingsw.client.CLI.utils
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    it.polimi.ingsw.client.CLI
     
  • Class
    Description
    BackgroundColors
    Enumeration BackgroundColors provide all the constants of the unicode standard that are used for changing color to text background.
    CharacterMapPrinter
    CharacterMapPrinter role is to manage all the character map components that are printed on the command line interface with the help of CharacterPrinter instance.
    CharacterPrinter
    CharacterPrinter role is to create every single box for specific character, after the creation all the created boxes are reunited by a single grid map by CharacterMapPrinter
    CloudMapPrinter
    CloudMapPrinter role is to manage all the cloud map components that are printed on the command line interface with the help of PrintClouds instance.
    Colors
    Enumeration Colors provide all the constants of the unicode standard that are used for changing color to text character.
    IslandMapPrinter
    IslandMapPrinter role is to manage all the island map components that are printed on the command line interface with the help of a IslandPrinter instance.
    IslandPrinter
    IslandPrinter role is to create every single island box, after the creation all the created boxes are reunited by a single grid map by IslandMapPrinter
    Lobby
    Lobby create all different parts of the printed lobby on the command line interface, with the help of a LobbyPrintManager, for every specific case
    LobbyPrintManager
    LobbyPrinterManager role is to print the exact lobby part for each specific case.
    MapPrinter
    MapPrinter role is to put together all difference maps
    PrintClouds
    PrintClouds is used for creating the skeleton of the cloud with all dynamics information inside
    PrintSchool
    PrintSchool is used for creating the skeleton of the school with all dynamics information inside
    PrintStaticMessage
    PrintStaticMessage print the static message of the game.
    SchoolMapPrinter
    SchoolMapPrinter role is to manage all the school map components that are printed on the command line interface with the help of a PrintSchool instance.
    UnicodeConstants
    Enumeration UnicodeConstants provide all the constants of the unicode standard that are used for printing the CLI board.
    UserHelper
    Class UserHelper provides all the information to the player regarding how to call an action during the turn.
